metadata.name: Ziegler et al. (2006)
metadata.authors: Cai-Nicolas Ziegler, Kai Simon, Georg Lausen

papers.title: Automatic Computation of Semantic Proximity Using Taxonomic Knowledge

interAnnoAgreement.description: We thus computed the inter-subject correlation, i.e., the Pearson correlation coefficient p(~vi, ~vj) (see Section 4.2.2) for every unordered pair {i, j} ∈ Bz ×Bz of human subjects, represented by their proximity rating vectors. Pair similarity scores were summed up and averaged afterwards:

We thus computed the inter-subject correlation, i.e., the Pearson correlation coefficient p(~vi, ~vj) (see Section 4.2.2) for every unordered pair {i, j} ∈ Bz ×Bz of human subjects, represented by their proximity rating vectors. Pair similarity scores were summed up and averaged afterwards:
